pkgmetadata.longdescription: TDT Tests for Extended Haplotypes // Functions and examples are provided for Transmission/disequilibrium tests for extended marker haplotypes, as in Clayton, D. and Jones, H. (1999) "Transmission/disequilibrium tests for extended marker haplotypes". Amer. J. Hum. Genet., 65:1161-1169, doi:10.1086/302566.
